column2: granddaughter and I dined at Little Goat Diner on a Saturday night in March. Although the restaurant was very busy
column3: the service was friendly and attentive; and the server had excellent suggestions. I thoroughly enjoyed the shrimp and cheesy grits and the side of Brussels sprouts (these were fabulous - you must try)
column4: along with an very good apple flavored cocktail. I sampled my daughter's chicken pot pie
column5: but was not impressed; rather dry and not much taste. I did love my granddaughter's mac & cheese (and so did she)! Â This place is worth a try
column6: especially if you're up for a very casual
column8: fun and rather noisy dining experience.
